text: One of the inputs in production that can be motivated by remuneration is
explanation: Labour is motivated by paying wages and salaries

text: The allocation of tasks to different skills in a production process is referred to as
explanation: Division of labour; the assignment of different parts of a manufacturing process or task to different people in order to improve efficiency.

text: The sales of goods through a medium that accepts money and delivers the items to the customer is
explanation: vending machiine; a machine that dispenses small articles such as food, drinks, or cigarettes when a coin or token is inserted.

text: The main purpose of branding is to
explanation: It is a way of distinguishing yourself from the competitors and clarifying what it is you offer that makes you the better choice.

text: The basis for international trade is embedded in the principle of
explanation: A person has a comparative advantage at producing something if he can produce it at lower cost than anyone else. This is one of the basis of international trade

text: The major problem encountered in international trade is that of
explanation: The most common issues you can face doing international trade is the difference in currency and exchange rate

text: The document a seller uses in dispatching goods to a customer by a carrier is
explanation: A delivery note is a document sent with a shipment of goods that describes the goods and the quantities being delivered.

text: A document which serves as an order with details of goods required by an intending purchaser is
explanation: An indent ia an official order or requisition for goods.

text: If a customer pays within nine days of receiving goods and takes advantage of 3% off the invoice price, this is stated as
explanation: 9/30;net 3.This means that, the buyer will get a 3% discount if payment is made on or before day 9

text: Which of the following is a characteristic of a bearer cheque

options.A: it is made with transverse lines
options.B: it is made payable to whoever presents it
options.C: it is made without transverse lines
options.D: it is only payable into the payees account

explanation: A bearer cheque is payable to the bearer of the cheque.

text: A bill of exchange paid before its due date at an amount less than its face value is said to have been
explanation: A discounted bill is one  sold for early payment to a bank or credit institution at less than face value after the bank deducts fees and applicable interest charges.

text: The most effective type of advertising for branded products is
explanation: Informative advertisingis the delivery of advertising messages through mass media with the intent of informing a target market about the benefits offered by a product

text: A current account holder pays fees for services in form of
explanation: The termbank chargecovers allchargesandfeesmade by abankto their customers. The term often relates tochargesin respect of personal current accounts or checking account.

text: Printed messages sent by cable are recorded as
explanation: Telegram is a message sent by telegraph and then delivered in written or printed form

text: Communication is relevant to business activities because it

options.B: reduces the cost and risk of travelling
options.D: enhances delivery of goods and servicess

explanation: Effectivecommunicationcan help to foster a good working relationship between you, your staff and customer which can in turn improve morale and efficiency.

text: Assurance is different from insurance in that the former is based on
explanation: Assurance is similar to insurance, with the terms often used interchangeably. However, insurance refers to coverage over a limited time, whereas assurance applies to persistent coverage for extended periods or until death.

explanation: Insured refers to the owner of the property insured or the person whose life is the subject of the contract of insurance

text: In case of a liquidation of a public limited liability company, those that are first paid are
explanation: Debenture-holdersare the subscribers to debentures. Debentures are part of loan. A shareholder or member is the joint owner of a company; but a debenture holder is only a creditor of the company. In the event of liquidation, they are paid first before any other class of lenders.

text: A feature common to public and private limited liability companies is that

options.A: both can sue and be sued
options.B: the minimum number of their shareholders is five
options.C: the transfer of their shares is not restricted
options.D: their annual accounts are published for public use

explanation:
Common FeaturesofPrivateandPublic Limited Companies
Both types of companies are registered with the words “Ltd” / “Sdn Bhd” under the Companies Act.The shareholders and the company are separate entities, they can sue and be suedAll shareholders have limited liability.A board of directors is elected by the shareholders. ...Salaries managers are employed to manage the business.

text: A business organization can obtain long term financing through
explanation: Share capital is a longterm means of sourcing for business funds. It is the part of the capital of a company that comes from the issue of shares.

text: The portion of the authorized share capital given out to the public for subscription is
explanation: TheIssued Capitalrefers to the number of shares issued by the company to the shareholders.

text: A company has an authorized capital of 40 million shares at N1 each, out of which 32 million are issued and fully paid-up. What happens to the remaining 8 million shares?

options.A: it has been issued but not paid-up
options.B: it has been applied for but not issued
options.D: it has not yet been issued

explanation: The remaining 8million shares have not been issued out for subscription by the public.

text:
Given:

opening stock #1,800
purchases #2,800
sales #8,000
closing stock # 350
carriage on sales # 500

calculate the value of the unused stock.
explanation: Unused stock can also be referred to closing stock. that is the left over stock after sales. In this case closing stock is 350

text: The main objective of a trade association is to

options.B: boost the trade of its members

explanation: Theobjectiveoftrade associationsis to promote the business interests of the members, exchange views, serve as a platform for discussions and to represent the interests of its members.

text: The promotion and protection of trade industry and agriculture through trade fairs is a function of
explanation: TheChamber'smission is creating an environment in which businesses can prosper. The main function of a Chamber of Commerce is to promote interest in local business possibilities.

text: Securities that entitle the investor to coupon rates are
explanation: Abondis a debtsecuritywhere the issuer (the borrower) issues thebondfor purchase by the bondholder (the lender). It is also known as a fixed incomesecurityas abondusually gives theinvestora regular or fixed return in the form of interest payments (sometimes calledcouponpayments).

text: The promotion of team spirit in an organization is referred to as
explanation: Espritde corpsis a feeling of loyalty and pride that is shared by the members of a group who consider themselves to be different from other people in some special way.

text: One of the characteristics of a good organizational chart is that it should
explanation:
Features of a Good Organisational Structure:
Clear line of authority.Adequate delegation of authority.Lesser managerial levels.Proper span of control.Simple and flexible.Good communication channels

text: An organization which focuses on consumer satisfaction is practicing
explanation: Themarketing conceptis the philosophy that firms should analyze the needs of their customers and then make decisions to satisfy those needs, better than the competition.

text: Good and services are made available to consumers through
explanation: Adistribution channelis a chain of businesses or intermediaries through which a good or service passes until it reaches the final buyer or the end consumer.

text: A person who in consideration for an extra commission takes responsibility for goods sold on credit and in case of default is a
explanation: Del Credere AgentLaw and Legal Definition. A del credere is an agent who guarantees the solvency of third parties with whom the agent contracts on behalf of the principal.

text: Yahaya bought a piece of furniture on a credit sale agreement from Ahmed and resold it to Ali before all installments were made .The court upheld that Ahmed could not recover possession of the items from Ali. The reason for the judgement was because

options.A: ownership was transfered on completeion of installment
options.C: Yahaya could not pass title to a third party
options.D: Ali was still indebted to Yahaya

explanation: Ahmed  lost ownership of the property the moment he transferred ownership to yahaya whether he was fully compensated or not.

text: The body which ensures that consumers are protected against harmful products in Nigeria is
explanation: The Standard Organisation of Nigeria (SON) is the sole statutory body that is vested with the responsibility of standardising and regulating the quality of all products in Nigeria.

text: The process of decoding data in a computer is known as
explanation: Decryptionis the process of taking encoded or encrypted text or other data and converting it back into text that you or the computer can read and understand.

text: Computers that process all data as binary zeros and ones are
explanation: Digital Computersoperate in binary, meaning they storedataand perform calculations using only zeros and ones. A single binary digit can only represent True (1) or False (0) in boolean logic.Mar 22, 2018

text: Modern means of payment is greatly facilitated by
explanation: E-banking;this is an online banking that allows a user to conduct financial transactions via the Internet. This has greatly impacted business transactions in a way that, sellers and buyers do not necessarily need to be in direct contact before transacting business

text: The provision of quality and safe products which guarantee the health of consumers is an example of
explanation: Quality control; is a system of maintaining standards in manufactured products by testing a sample of the output against the specification.

text: A business organization must always consider the overall effect of its actions on the
explanation: As a business cooperation, your product should have a positive impact on the society at large.

text: If the rate of turnover of a company in 1999 was 4 times while the average stock was N 49,600, determine the turnover.
Dealing in quoted securities on the Nigerian Stock Exchange is restricted to authorized
explanation: Aquoted securityis a marketable security in a class of marketable securities listed for quotation on a stock market of a securities exchange. Itn the NSE it is stock brokers that deal on such securities.
